comments:
While doing the smoketest this week,

We found a regression due to a fix put in for 157117.

Problem occurs when importing an EAR in a new workspace, before defining any server runtimes.

Because the there are no runtimes to select.. <None> as a target is selected by default, a NPE is thrown verifying the EAR selected...  The dialog is not functional from that point....   Only workaround is to create runtime first....

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 157117 ***
